user_profile: User 262 is a middle-aged male who enjoys a balance of social and solitary activities. With a conscientious and emotionally stable personality, he prefers structured environments like his office, where he often spends most of his weekdays. He enjoys regular visits to coffee shops to start his mornings, often in the company of friends or colleagues. On weekends, he seeks relaxation and connection with nature through visits to local parks. Although he is somewhat introverted, he displays an agreeable nature, making him well-liked in social settings. He appreciates exploring new experiences, shown by his occasional visits to entertainment venues. User 262 is likely to return to familiar places like his favorite coffee shop (POI ID 1244) and parks (POI IDs 279, 1829), while potentially exploring new neighborhoods (POI ID 3513) and entertainment spots (POI ID 3587) in the future.
